title: Indonesia. Parts 1 & 2
creator_contributor_role: Australia. Special Broadcasting Service, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Indonesia - Description and travel
description: Episode of Series "A Travellers' guide to the Orient". The collection of islands comprising Indonesia is the largest archipelago in the world and has a human history that dates back to the stone-age. This program explores the people and country of Indonesia from the crowded streets of Jakarta to the historic ruins of Yogyakarta. We explore the Spice Islands, sail into the crater of Krakatoa and jungle trek through the Ujung Kulon Game reserve. Includes an exploration of Bali and some of the Holy Islamic sites. This program is in two parts of 30 minutes duration.
